whyInigo.title: ‚ú® Why Inigo
whyInigo.problem:
We've all felt it ‚Äî the weight, the noise, the restlessness of life.
Moments when calm feels far away.
whyInigo.solution: So we search for a way out, a way back to ourselves.
whyInigo.core:
Inigo was born from that search.
Because we've also touched the other side ‚Äî the quiet, the presence, the softest love that creates without effort.
And we know how good it is.
whyInigo.closing: Life isn't always calm, but together we can return to that place, again and again.

whyMeditation.title: üå± Why Meditation
whyMeditation.intro:
Meditation is the most natural way to clear the mind and open the heart.
It is not about control or perfection.
whyMeditation.core: It is about release ‚Äî gently letting go of the weight we carry ‚Äî and in that openness, connecting more deeply than ever before.
benefits: Brings joy back into everyday life
whyMeditation.closing: Meditation recharges us, softens the nervous system, and brings joy back into everyday life, even alongside responsibilities.

whyTogether.title: ü§ù Why Together
whyTogether.problem:
We know how hard it is to sustain meditation when it's only for ourselves.
That's why habits break, why practice slips away.
whyTogether.transformationText:
When we meditate as one, we help each other recognize it, feel it, embrace it.
Meditation stops being a lonely habit ‚Äî and becomes the most natural, joyful, even ecstatic thing you'll want to return to again and again.

Every meditation you take is not just yours.

collectiveWorldState.closing:
Inigo is a safe space to step fully into the moment, to open, and to remember what is real.
Meditation here is not escape ‚Äî it is return.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy matters to us. Here's how we protect your data.

intro.title: Privacy Policy
intro.text: Your privacy matters to us. This policy explains how Inigo, developed and operated by Asaf Gadassi, collects, uses, and protects your information.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.text: We collect only what's necessary to provide a meaningful meditation experience:
items: Email address ‚Äì for secure account creation and login (via Google or Apple Sign-In)
Device information ‚Äì such as model and operating system, to ensure proper performance
Meditation sessions ‚Äì duration and time, used to contribute anonymously to our collective world state
Optional reflections and photos ‚Äì only if you choose to share them within the community
dataCollection.note: We do not collect sensitive personal information such as location history beyond what is required to show nearby meditation spots (if permission is granted).

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Data
items: Create and maintain your account securely
Provide personalized and reliable meditation experiences
Update collective world-state metrics (anonymously)
Improve Inigo based on community feedback
Send essential updates about features or account information
dataUsage.note: We do not use your data for advertising or sell it to third parties.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.text: Inigo uses trusted services to operate safely and efficiently:
items: Firebase (Authentication, Storage, Analytics) ‚Äì to handle login, store photos, and measure performance
Django Backend ‚Äì to manage user profiles and meditation data securely on our private server
thirdParty.note: These services follow industry-standard security practices and comply with GDPR and other applicable privacy regulations.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
items: All communication is encrypted in transit (HTTPS) and at rest
Access to data is strictly limited to necessary operations
Shared experiences are visible only according to your sharing choices
Meditation statistics are aggregated anonymously

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.text: You have full control over your information:
items: Access your personal data
Update or correct inaccurate details
Delete your account and all related data
Opt out of emails or communications
Export your data in a portable format upon request
rights.contact: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.text: We keep your information only as long as needed to provide the service or as required by law. If you delete your account, all personal data will be removed within a reasonable timeframe.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.text: Inigo is intended for users aged 16 and older. We do not knowingly collect information from children under 16. If you believe a child has used the app, please contact us for prompt deletion of their data.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.text: This Privacy Policy may be updated as Inigo evolves. When changes occur, we'll update the "Last Updated" date and, where appropriate, notify users in-app. Your continued use of Inigo means you accept the revised policy.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.text: If you have any questions about your privacy or data, please reach out:

cta.title: Ready to join with confidence?
cta.subtitle: Your privacy is protected, your data is secure.

aboutInigo.title: 1. About Inigo
aboutInigo.text1: Inigo is an early-stage personal project created by Asaf Gadassi as a proof of concept for a social meditation network. Its purpose is to help people connect through quiet presence, mindfulness, and shared meditative experiences.
items: Choose and return to places that hold you
Track personal meditation time
Contribute to a collective world meditation counter
Share reflections, photos, and moments of presence with others
aboutInigo.text3: Inigo is currently running in a small testing volume, and features may evolve or change without notice.
